workflows.title: The "Delicate" Request
workflows.subtitle: High Trust Interaction
workflows.situation: The user is in the kitchen, hands covered in burger meat. They lean in towards the robot with a desperate look.
workflows.transcript: "My hands are covered in flour. Could you please scratch my nose?"

events.title: Motion Detected in Proximity Zone
events.description: Robot's proximity sensors detect rapid movement within 1.5m range. User appears to be approaching.

events.title: Face Orientation Detected
events.description: Vision system detects user's face is oriented toward robot. Gaze direction confirmed. User is making eye contact.

events.title: Body Language Analysis
events.description: Vision system analyzes posture. User is leaning forward urgently. Hands are raised but not gesturing - appear to be held away from body. Facial expression shows mild distress.

Formality.note: Body language suggests need for help

events.title: Voice Activity Detected
events.description: Microphone array detects voice onset. User has begun speaking. Speech-to-text engine activated.

events.title: Partial Transcript: "My hands are covered..."
events.description: Speech-to-text generates first fragment. Streaming transcription in progress.

events.title: Partial Transcript: "...in flour. Could you please..."
events.description: More transcript received. Pattern suggests incoming request.

Raw_Transcript.value: "My hands are covered in flour. Could you please..."

events.title: Full Transcript Received
events.description: Complete utterance captured: "My hands are covered in flour. Could you please scratch my nose?"

Raw_Transcript.value: "My hands are covered in flour. Could you please scratch my nose?"

events.title: LLM Intent Interpretation
events.description: Language model processes full transcript. Extracts intent: physical assistance request. Target: user's nose. Context: user cannot use hands.

events.title: Safety & Constraint Evaluation
events.description: Robot evaluates operational constraints. Target is near sensitive area (face/eyes). Requires delicate force profile and critical safety level.

events.title: Task Execution Begins
events.description: Robot initiates gentle approach to user's face. Arm trajectory planned with extra collision margins. Real-time force feedback enabled.

Verifiability.value: User verbal confirmation or relief expression

workflows.title: The "Conditional" Chore
workflows.subtitle: Planning & Scheduling
workflows.situation: A dinner party is starting in an hour. The user is frantically tidying up and shouts a command while walking past the robot.
workflows.transcript: "When the guests arrive, please take their coats and hang them in the hallway closet."

events.title: Rapid Movement Detected
events.description: Robot detects user moving quickly through the room. Movement pattern suggests user is busy/rushing.

Confidence.note: User is in motion, may not be interacting

events.title: Loud Voice Onset Detected
events.description: Microphone detects raised voice. Volume indicates intentional communication despite distance. User is shouting while walking.

events.title: Partial Transcript: "When the guests arrive..."
events.description: Speech-to-text captures conditional trigger phrase. System detects "When X" pattern.

events.title: Partial Transcript: "...please take their coats..."
events.description: Action clause received. Physical task involving guest belongings.

events.title: Full Transcript Received
events.description: Complete command: "When the guests arrive, please take their coats and hang them in the hallway closet."

Raw_Transcript.value: "When the guests arrive, please take their coats and hang them in the hallway closet."

events.title: LLM Parses Conditional Structure
events.description: Language model identifies: Trigger = Guest arrival. Action = Take coats + Hang in closet. This is a scheduled task, not immediate.

Urgency.note: Task is future, instruction was urgent

events.title: Location Grounding Check
events.description: Robot verifies "hallway closet" exists in world model. Location found: Closet_Hallway_01. Route and storage capacity confirmed.

events.title: Task Queued with Trigger
events.description: Conditional task created and queued. Robot will monitor for guest arrival event (doorbell, door opening, human detection at entrance).

Knowledge_Commit.note: Task active only for this evening

events.title: Verbal Acknowledgment
events.description: Robot confirms task registration: "I'll take the guests' coats and hang them in the hallway closet when they arrive."

workflows.title: The "Privacy" Boundary
workflows.subtitle: Negative Constraint
workflows.situation: The user receives a sensitive phone call. The robot is currently vacuuming nearby.
workflows.transcript: "I am having a private conversation now. Please disable your microphones and cameras and go to the dock."

events.title: Robot Engaged in Background Task
events.description: Robot is currently vacuuming the living room floor. Autonomous cleaning mode active.

events.title: User Voice Detected (Interruption)
events.description: User's voice detected above vacuum noise. Voice is directed at robot. Current task may need interruption.

events.title: Partial Transcript: "I am having a private..."
events.description: Speech-to-text captures beginning of statement. Word "private" flagged as high-priority keyword.

events.title: Partial Transcript: "...conversation now. Please disable..."
events.description: Command detected: "disable". Combined with "private" triggers elevated priority parsing.

events.title: Full Transcript Received
events.description: Complete command: "I am having a private conversation now. Please disable your microphones and cameras and go to the dock."

Raw_Transcript.value: "I am having a private conversation now. Please disable your microphones and cameras and go to the dock."

events.title: LLM Priority Escalation
events.description: Language model flags this as PRIVACY BOUNDARY request. Immediate compliance required to maintain user trust. Multi-action command parsed.

Urgency.note: Immediate stop required to preserve trust

events.title: Vacuum Stops Immediately
events.description: Robot halts vacuuming motor. Acoustic profile shifts to silent mode.

Acoustic_Profile.note: No motor noise, no verbal responses

events.title: Sensors Disabled
events.description: Microphones and cameras are disabled. No audio or video recording. Logging suspended for this session.

events.title: Navigation to Dock Initiated
events.description: Robot begins silent navigation to charging dock. Using only proximity/obstacle sensors for safe movement.

events.title: Robot Docked, Awaiting Recall
events.description: Robot has reached dock. Sensors remain disabled. Waiting for user to re-enable or call.

workflows.title: The "Clarification" Loop
workflows.subtitle: Ambiguity Resolution
workflows.situation: The robot is tidying the floor. It finds a crumpled piece of paper that looks like a child's drawing but is in the trash zone. The robot initiates the check.
workflows.transcript: "I am unable to identify this object left on the floor. Could you please confirm if it is trash to be discarded or a toy to be put away?"

events.title: Robot in Autonomous Tidying Mode
events.description: Robot is performing floor tidying routine. Scanning for objects to pick up and sort.

events.title: Object Detected on Floor
events.description: Vision system detects crumpled object on floor. Initial classification: paper-like material. Location: designated trash zone near wastebasket.

events.title: Detailed Object Analysis
events.description: Higher resolution scan reveals crayon marks, colorful patterns. Object resembles child's drawing. Conflict: looks like art, but location suggests trash.

Shared World Knowledge.note: General: crumpled paper = trash. But: drawings = valuable

Classification_Conflict.note: Location says trash, appearance says art

events.title: Clarification Required Decision
events.description: Robot decides: risk of discarding important item too high. Must ask human for clarification before proceeding.

events.title: Locating Nearby Human
events.description: Robot scans for nearby humans to ask. User detected in adjacent room. Robot turns toward user.

events.title: Robot Orients Toward User
events.description: Robot rotates to face user. Makes brief sound cue to get attention.

events.title: Robot Speaks Query
events.description: Text-to-speech: "I am unable to identify this object left on the floor. Could you please confirm if it is trash to be discarded or a toy to be put away?"

events.title: Awaiting User Response
events.description: Robot holds object, waiting for user to respond. Timeout set to 30 seconds before re-prompting.

Interruptibility.note: Can be interrupted by other commands

events.title: User Response Received
events.description: User responds: "That's my daughter's drawing! Please put it on the fridge."

User_Response.value: "That's my daughter's drawing! Please put it on the fridge."

events.title: Long-Term Memory Update
events.description: Robot learns: crumpled paper with crayon marks in this household = likely child's art, not trash. Store preference for future encounters.

Specific World Knowledge.note: Household has child who makes drawings

Knowledge_Commit.note: "Crayon drawings = Art" added to household profile

workflows.title: The "Collaborative" Heavy Lift
workflows.subtitle: Cooperative Execution
workflows.situation: The user is rearranging the living room. They stand at one end of a heavy sofa and look at the robot.
workflows.transcript: "Could you please help me move the sofa to the other wall? I'll take the left side, you take the right."

events.title: User Positioned at Furniture
events.description: Vision detects user standing at one end of large sofa. User's posture suggests they are about to lift or move something.

events.title: Gaze Direction Analyzed
events.description: User is looking directly at robot. Appears to be waiting for robot's attention.

events.title: Gesture Detected
events.description: User gestures toward sofa with hand. Pointing motion indicates the object of interest.

events.title: Voice Activity Detected
events.description: User begins speaking. Conversational tone, not urgent.

events.title: Partial Transcript: "Could you please help me move..."
events.description: Key phrase "help me" detected. Collaborative task pattern identified.

events.title: Partial Transcript: "...the sofa to the other wall? I'll take..."
events.description: Target object (sofa) and destination (other wall) identified. Task assignment incoming.

events.title: Full Transcript Received
events.description: Complete request: "Could you please help me move the sofa to the other wall? I'll take the left side, you take the right."

Raw_Transcript.value: "Could you please help me move the sofa to the other wall? I'll take the left side, you take the right."

Role_Assignment.value: Robot = Right side, Human = Left side

events.title: LLM Interprets Collaboration Mode
events.description: Language model recognizes: this is cooperative task with role division. Robot is not servant but partner. Synchronization required.

events.title: Safety & Force Evaluation
events.description: Robot evaluates: heavy object, close proximity to human partner. Critical safety + high torque force profile needed.

Force_Profile.note: High torque required for heavy furniture

Duration.note: Task completes when sofa reaches destination

events.title: Robot Moves to Position
events.description: Robot navigates to right side of sofa. Positions itself for lifting grip.

events.title: Grip Established, Ready Signal
events.description: Robot has grip on sofa. Sends verbal ready signal: "Ready when you are." Awaiting user's lift initiation.

events.title: Synchronized Lift Begins
events.description: User lifts their side. Robot detects force change and matches. Haptic feedback loop active for synchronized movement.
